title: Russia allows 15 companies to remain listed abroad - finance ministry - Yahoo Finance
content: Russia allows 15 companies to remain listed abroad - finance ministry  Yahoo Finance
description: Russia has given 15 companies including metals giant Nornickel and liquefied natural gas producer Novatek approval to remain listed on foreign exchanges, the finance ministry said on Wednesday.  Russian President Vladimir Putin signed a bill in April requiring Russian companies to delist their depositary receipts to reduce the influence foreign countries could over them, except if they were granted permission to remain listed.  The finance ministry said that out of the 36 Russian companies with depositary receipts, 19 had requested permission and 15 were successful.
